title: Lotus Lee
description:
Lotus Passion in the background of the virtual Asian country Hongjing.
Hong Jing's young Lotus Lee entered the prison as a new inmate. Lotus decides to fill his sentence very quietly and unobtrusively. Unfortunately, however, Lotus was an exceptionally remarkable handsome man, and there are too many people to push such a lotus. To make matters worse, even King Minakom, Hong Jing's dangerous drug dealer and president of a luxury hotel, begins to be interested in Lotus. Lotus, who tried to live quietly by killing his temper, eventually made an irreparable mistake because he couldn't stand it, and decided to seduce King Minakom to solve this situation...

matches.title: When a Yakuza Falls in Love
